name: Waking from Cryosleep
description:
A short text adventure about waking from cryosleep to a mission of interstellar travel. It links with my earlier work, Lightyear:

http://chromebookbob.itch.io/lightyear

Made for the Twiny game jam. Leave feedback there:

http://itch.io/jam/twiny/rate/21562

Questions etc.: NebulaicToaster[at]gmail.com
